stance: I am trying to reduce my meat eating
I eat chicken, fish, some beef, and deli meats
I very rarely eat pork or steak
Eating healthier proteins is better for me
I think reducing saturated fats is healthier
I want to eat healthier as I age
More restaurant options for non-meat proteins help me reduce meat
I try tofu, vegetarian, and vegan meals for variety
My family prefers more meat than I do
Personal preference motivates my family's meat-eating
I snack on carrots and celery instead of meat
I want more vegan and vegetarian restaurant options
I want menus to list calories and fat content
